sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import "./singlePost.css"; import axios from "axios"; export default function SinglePost() { const location = useLocation(); const path = location.pathname.split('/')[2]; const [post, setPost] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { const getPost = async () => { const res = await axios.get("/posts/" + path); setPost(res.data) console.log('res---', res); }; getPost(); }, [path]); return (
